Anushka Sharma Wishes Husband Virat Kohli In An Adorable Post, Thanks God For His Birth
Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli’s love outshines whenever they are together. While Virat cannot stop gushing over his lady love, Anushka, on the other hand, is always beaming with joy holding his hand and walking beside him. They’re just perfect for each other, aren’t they?

It’s Virat Kohli’s birthday today. And Anushka Sharma took to Twitter to share the love for her husband. In an adorable post, she wrote, “Thank God for his birth”.
Also Read: Anushka Sharma Is In Awe Of Virat Kohli’s Record-Breaking Performance, Can’t Stop Gushing ‘What A Man’ He Is
Recently, Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma celebrated their first Karwa Chauth together. This how they showered love upon each other.

No matter how busy they are in their respective work life, Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma always manage to take out time for each other.
“We try to create a proper work-life balance. Both of us really love doing what we do professionally… But at the same time, we try and find time to do something together. We don’t take our professions or our career too seriously… We don’t draw our identity only from that. We are very simple and like doing normal things,” Anushka had said in an interview before.
Aren’t they both just perfect for each other?
